title: Here's looking at you, Warner Bros.
creator_credit: Robert Guenette, Wolper Organisation and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: This feature length documentary celebrates 90 years of moviemaking history at Warner Bros in Hollywood. An entertaining chronicle of the studio’s history unfolds using choice moments from classic Warner films, interviews with artists and technicians, early screentests by Lana Turner, Orson Welles, Marlon Brando and Paul Newman, bloopers by Ronald Reagan and James Cagney and historical behind-the-scenes footage. Narrated by Clint Eastwood, Barbra Streisand, Goldie Hawn, Steven Spielberg and Chevy Chase.
